title: PROGRAM RYZE SKIN
body:
Honestly i think a program ryze skin would look amazing and there is a couple of reasons.
1. Ryze's Abilities have the possibility of being technological, robotic or futuristic. 
Both {{champion:13}} 'E' and 'R' would work really well as the e ability puts that ring around enemies, it looks very sci-fi rather than magic. as well as his teleport being a futuristic kind of thing. 

anyways i thought it would be really cool but i feel like everyone might think it stupid

replies.body: thats great idea and will look really good but i don't think raze needs anymore skins {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
yeah i would like to see more skins on champs that only have 1 or 2, but i really like the program skins and want them to continue it

It would be a pretty hectic skin but i have o agree we need more skins for other champions with less skins like Aureleon Sol. If you check out my page you can see a consept ive been working on if youd like to see
couldnt see anything man but thanks!
